====== Site visit

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:basal-area-lite-dbh-measures-protocol-shapes:stand-basal-area:site-visit`
|Label | Site visit
|Definition | Observations _MUST_ have a value for `tern:hasSiteVisit`.
|Comment | Observations following the Lite DBH measures protocol are made in the context of a site visit.
